text: A Circle of Deception is a 1960 British World War II movie directed by Jack Lee and was based on the 1953 short story Small Back Room in St. Marylebone by Alec Waugh. It stars Bradford Dillman, Suzy Parker, Harry Andrews, Robert Stephens, Ronald Allen, John Welsh, Martin Boddey, Charles Lloyd-Peck and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 war movies Category:British war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Lee
title: A Circle of Deception
